text: No muri abo banyagihugu, harimwo abemera Imana yabo y’ukuri hamwe n’umusi w’imperuka, kandi bakemera yuko muvyo batanga arivyo bibegereza ku Mana, hamwe n’ibisabisho vy’intumwa y’Imana, rero nimwumve yuko ivyo bagira vyose nivyo kubegereza ku Mana, nayo niyo izobinjiza mumpuhwe zayo, ntankeka Imana niyo ifise ikigongwe cinshi kandi niyo ifise impuhwe zihagije
